Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Thulsa's units control the terrain near Firebase Audacity.

Kill {@LinkCreature:52#2006#cursed legion dragoons}, {@LinkCreature:52#6002#Thulsan destroyers}, and {@LinkCreature:52#1002#undead polykinds} to give the firebase troops room to maneuver.

Report to Raneria in Habere when the mission is complete.
Here's your reward, and the gratitude of the federation!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
